member.name: T:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest
member.summary: Represents an object that implements a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) client.

member.name: T:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest
member.summary: Represents an object that makes a request to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.Abort
member.summary: Aborts the Request.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Provides an asynchronous version of the System.Net.WebRequest.GetRequestStream() method.
member.param: The System.AsyncCallback delegate.
An object containing state information for this asynchronous request.
member.returns: An System.IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous request.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Returns a System.IO.Stream for writing data to the Internet resource.
member.param: An System.IAsyncResult that references a pending request for a stream.
member.returns: A System.IO.Stream to write data to.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous request for an Internet resource.
member.param: The System.AsyncCallback delegate.
An object containing state information for this asynchronous request.
member.returns: An System.IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous request.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.EndGetResponse(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Returns an IWebResponse.
member.param: An System.IAsyncResult that references a pending request for a response.
member.returns: An IWebResponse that contains a response to the Internet request.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.GetRequestStream
member.summary: Returns a System.IO.Stream for writing data to the Internet resource.
member.returns: A System.IO.Stream for writing data to the Internet resource.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.GetResponse
member.summary: Returns a response to an Internet request.
member.returns: An IWebResponse containing the response to the Internet request.

member.summary: Gets or sets values indicating the level of authentication and impersonation used for this request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the cache policy for this request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection group for the request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content length of the request data being sent.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content type of the request data being sent.

member.summary: Gets or sets the network credentials used for authenticating the request with the Internet resource.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.ImpersonationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the impersonation level for the current request.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the protocol method to use in this request.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.PreAuthenticate
member.summary: Indicates whether to pre-authenticate the request.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access this Internet resource.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.RequestUri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the Internet resource associated with the request.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time, in milliseconds, before the request times out.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets a System.Boolean value that controls whether System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials are sent with requests.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.ClientCertificates
member.summary: Gets or sets the certificates used for establishing an encrypted connection to the FTP server.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.ContentOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets a byte offset into the file being downloaded by this request.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.EnableSsl
member.summary: Gets or sets a System.Boolean that specifies that an SSL connection should be used.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.KeepAlive
member.summary: Gets or sets a System.Boolean value that specifies whether the control connection to the FTP server is closed after the request completes.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a time-out when reading from or writing to a stream.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.RenameTo
member.summary: Gets or sets the new name of a file being renamed.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.ServicePoint
member.summary: Gets the System.Net.ServicePoint object used to connect to the FTP server.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.UsePassive
member.summary: Gets or sets the behavior of a client application's data transfer process.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebRequest.UseBinary
member.summary: Gets or sets a System.Boolean value that specifies the data type for file transfers.

member.summary: Represents an object that provides a response from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

member.summary: Closes the response stream.

member.summary: Returns the data stream from the Internet resource.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content length of data being received.

member.summary: Gets a System.Boolean value that indicates whether mutual authentication occurred.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebResponse.BannerMessage
member.summary: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when a connection is established prior to logon.

member.summary: Gets the message sent by the server when the FTP session is ending.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebResponse.LastModified
member.summary: Gets the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified.

member.summary: Gets the most recent status code sent from the FTP server.

member.summary: Gets text that describes a status code sent from the FTP server.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IFtpWebResponse.WelcomeMessage
member.summary: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when authentication is complete.

member.summary: No operation is running.

member.summary: An operation is in progress.

member.summary: Specifies the result of the operation.

member.summary: No result.

member.summary: The operation completed.

member.summary: The operation was canceled.

member.name: T:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation
member.summary: Provides common methods for sending and receiving data using a WebRequest.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.Download(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the resource to a local file.
member.param: The name of the local file that is to receive the data.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.GetDownloadLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the data being received.
member.returns: The length of the data being received in bytes.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.Upload(System.String)
member.summary: Uploads the specified local file to the resource.
member.param: The file to send to the resource.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.Upload(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Uploads the specified local file to the resource.
member.param: The file to send to the resource.
The maximum number of bytes to upload. If the value is 0 or less the entire file will be uploaded.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.CheckConnection
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if a connection can be made to the resource.

member.name: M:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the operation.

member.name: E:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.ProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the operation successfully transfers some data.

member.summary: Gets the inner WebRequest object.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.State
member.summary: Gets the state of the operation.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.Result
member.summary: Gets the result of the last operation.

member.summary: Indicates whether the buffer will be automatically sized.

member.name: P:harlam357.Net.IWebOperation.Buffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the internal buffer size.
